span_singleton_ann_ideal_generator:
/-- `ann_ideal_generator ğ•œ a` is indeed a generator. -/
@[simp]
theorem span_singleton_ann_ideal_generator (a : A) : ideal.span {ann_ideal_generator ğ•œ a} = ann_ideal ğ•œ a :=
  by
  by_cases h : ann_ideal_generator ğ•œ a = 0
  Â· rw [h, ann_ideal_generator_eq_zero_iff.mp h, set.singleton_zero, ideal.span_zero]
  Â· rw [ann_ideal_generator, ideal.span_singleton_mul_right_unit, ideal.span_singleton_generator]
    apply polynomial.is_unit_C.mpr
    apply IsUnit.mk0
    apply inv_eq_zero.not.mpr
    apply polynomial.leading_coeff_eq_zero.not.mpr
    apply (mul_ne_zero_iff.mp h).1
#align span_singleton_ann_ideal_generator span_singleton_ann_ideal_generator
monic_generator_eq_minpoly:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
/-- If a monic generates the annihilating ideal, it must match our choice
 of the annihilating ideal generator. -/
theorem monic_generator_eq_minpoly (a : A) (p : polynomial ğ•œ) (p_monic : p.monic)
    (p_gen : ideal.span {p} = ann_ideal ğ•œ a) : ann_ideal_generator ğ•œ a = p :=
  by
  by_cases h : p = 0
  Â· rwa [h, ann_ideal_generator_eq_zero_iff, â† p_gen, ideal.span_singleton_eq_bot.mpr]
  Â· rw [â† span_singleton_ann_ideal_generator, ideal.span_singleton_eq_span_singleton] at p_gen
    rw [eq_comm]
    apply eq_of_monic_of_associated p_monic _ p_gen
    Â· apply monic_ann_ideal_generator _ _ ((Associated.ne_zero_iff p_gen).mp h)
#align monic_generator_eq_minpoly monic_generator_eq_minpoly
monic_ann_ideal_generator:
/-- The generator we chose for the annihilating ideal is monic when the ideal is non-zero. -/
theorem monic_ann_ideal_generator (a : A) (hg : ann_ideal_generator ğ•œ a â‰  0) : monic (ann_ideal_generator ğ•œ a) :=
  monic_mul_leading_coeff_inv (mul_ne_zero_iff.mp hg).1
#align monic_ann_ideal_generator monic_ann_ideal_generator

theorem mem_iff_eq_smul_ann_ideal_generator {p : polynomial ğ•œ} (a : A) :
    p âˆˆ ann_ideal ğ•œ a â†” âˆƒ s : polynomial ğ•œ, p = Â«expr â€¢ Â» s (ann_ideal_generator ğ•œ a) := by

mem_iff_ann_ideal_generator_dvd:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
theorem mem_iff_ann_ideal_generator_dvd {p : polynomial ğ•œ} {a : A} : p âˆˆ ann_ideal ğ•œ a â†” ann_ideal_generator ğ•œ a âˆ£ p :=
  by rw [â† ideal.mem_span_singleton, span_singleton_ann_ideal_generator]

mem_ann_ideal_iff_aeval_eq_zero:

/-- It is useful to refer to ideal membership sometimes
 and the annihilation condition other times. -/
theorem mem_ann_ideal_iff_aeval_eq_zero {a : A} {p : polynomial R} : p âˆˆ ann_ideal R a â†” aeval a p = 0 :=
  iff.rfl
#align mem_ann_ideal_iff_aeval_eq_zero mem_ann_ideal_iff_aeval_eq_zero
degree_ann_ideal_generator_le_of_mem:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
/-- The generator of the annihilating ideal has minimal degree among
 the non-zero members of the annihilating ideal -/
theorem degree_ann_ideal_generator_le_of_mem (a : A) (p : polynomial ğ•œ) (hp : p âˆˆ ann_ideal ğ•œ a) (hpn0 : p â‰  0) :
    degree (ann_ideal_generator ğ•œ a) â‰¤ degree p :=
  degree_le_of_dvd (mem_iff_ann_ideal_generator_dvd.1 hp) hpn0
#align degree_ann_ideal_generator_le_of_mem degree_ann_ideal_generator_le_of_mem
ann_ideal_generator_mem:
/-- The annihilating ideal generator is a member of the annihilating ideal. -/
theorem ann_ideal_generator_mem (a : A) : ann_ideal_generator ğ•œ a âˆˆ ann_ideal ğ•œ a :=
  ideal.mul_mem_right _ _ (submodule.is_principal.generator_mem _)
#align ann_ideal_generator_mem ann_ideal_generator_mem
ann_ideal_generator_eq_zero_iff:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `Â«exprâŠ¥Â» -/
@[simp]
theorem ann_ideal_generator_eq_zero_iff {a : A} : ann_ideal_generator ğ•œ a = 0 â†” ann_ideal ğ•œ a = Â«exprâŠ¥Â» := by
  simp only [ann_ideal_generator, mul_eq_zero, is_principal.eq_bot_iff_generator_eq_zero, polynomial.C_eq_zero,
    inv_eq_zero, polynomial.leading_coeff_eq_zero, or_self_iff]
#align ann_ideal_generator_eq_zero_iff ann_ideal_generator_eq_zero_iff
ann_ideal_generator_eq_minpoly:
/-- The generator of the annihilating ideal is the minimal polynomial. -/
theorem ann_ideal_generator_eq_minpoly (a : A) : ann_ideal_generator ğ•œ a = minpoly ğ•œ a :=
  by
  by_cases h : ann_ideal_generator ğ•œ a = 0
  Â· rw [h, minpoly.eq_zero]
    rintro âŸ¨p, p_monic, hp : aeval a p = 0âŸ©
    refine' p_monic.ne_zero (ideal.mem_bot.mp _)
    simpa only [ann_ideal_generator_eq_zero_iff.mp h] using mem_ann_ideal_iff_aeval_eq_zero.mpr hp
  Â·
    exact
      minpoly.unique _ _ (monic_ann_ideal_generator _ _ h) (ann_ideal_generator_aeval_eq_zero _ _) fun q q_monic hq =>
        degree_ann_ideal_generator_le_of_mem a q (mem_ann_ideal_iff_aeval_eq_zero.mpr hq) q_monic.ne_zero
#align ann_ideal_generator_eq_minpoly ann_ideal_generator_eq_minpoly
ann_ideal_generator_aeval_eq_zero:
theorem ann_ideal_generator_aeval_eq_zero (a : A) : aeval a (ann_ideal_generator ğ•œ a) = 0 :=
  mem_ann_ideal_iff_aeval_eq_zero.mp (ann_ideal_generator_mem ğ•œ a)
#align ann_ideal_generator_aeval_eq_zero ann_ideal_generator_aeval_eq_zero
